mapper.select: SELECT g_id, G_TEAMID, G_TITLE, G_TAG, G_CREATEDATE, G_TIME, G_MINMEMBER, G_RESDATE, G_STATUS, G_USER_ID, S_ID, S_NUM, T_NAME, T_LOGO, T_REGION, T_PHONE, RANKSCORE, T_MINAGE, T_MAXAGE, T_MAXMEMBER, T_MEMBER, T_INFO, S_NAME, S_REGION, S_ADDR, S_OWNER, S_PHONE FROM ( SELECT g.G_ID, g.G_TEAMID, g.G_TITLE, g.G_TAG, g.G_CREATEDATE, g.G_TIME, g.G_MINMEMBER, g.G_RESDATE, g.G_STATUS, g.T_USERID AS G_USER_ID, g.S_ID, g.S_NUM, t.T_NAME, t.T_LOGO, t.T_REGION, t.T_PHONE, t.RANKSCORE, t.T_MINAGE, t.T_MAXAGE, t.T_MAXMEMBER, t.T_MEMBER, t.T_INFO, t.CREATED_ID, t.CREATED_DATE, t.UPDATED_ID, t.UPDATED_DATE, s.S_NAME, s.S_REGION, s.S_ADDR, s.S_OWNER, s.S_PHONE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY g.G_CREATEDATE DESC) AS rn FROM GAME g INNER JOIN TEAM t ON g.G_TEAMID = t.T_ID INNER JOIN STADIUM s ON g.S_ID = s.S_ID INNER JOIN REGIONCODE r ON s.S_REGION = r.region_name WHERE 1=1 AND g.G_TEAMID = #{tID} ) WHERE rn BETWEEN 1 AND 5

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN (T_HOMEID = #{tID} AND (HOME_GOAL - AWAY_GOAL) > 0) OR (T_AWAYID = #{tID} AND (AWAY_GOAL - HOME_GOAL) > 0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS winCount, SUM(CASE WHEN (T_HOMEID = #{tID} AND (HOME_GOAL - AWAY_GOAL) = 0) OR (T_AWAYID = #{tID} AND (AWAY_GOAL - HOME_GOAL) = 0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS drawCount, SUM(CASE WHEN (T_HOMEID = #{tID} AND (HOME_GOAL - AWAY_GOAL) < 0) OR (T_AWAYID = #{tID} AND (AWAY_GOAL - HOME_GOAL) < 0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS loseCount, COUNT(*) AS totalCount FROM G_RESULT WHERE T_HOMEID = #{tID} OR T_AWAYID = #{tID}

SELECT gr.G_ID, gr.T_HOMEID, gr.T_AWAYID, gr.HOME_GOAL, gr.AWAY_GOAL, gr.U_ID, g.G_RESDATE, th.T_NAME AS tHomeName, ta.T_NAME AS tAwayName, CASE WHEN gr.T_HOMEID = #{tID} AND (gr.HOME_GOAL - gr.AWAY_GOAL) > 0 THEN '승' WHEN gr.T_HOMEID = #{tID} AND (gr.HOME_GOAL - gr.AWAY_GOAL) < 0 THEN '패' WHEN gr.T_HOMEID = #{tID} AND (gr.HOME_GOAL - gr.AWAY_GOAL) = 0 THEN '무' WHEN gr.T_AWAYID = #{tID} AND (gr.AWAY_GOAL - gr.HOME_GOAL) > 0 THEN '승' WHEN gr.T_AWAYID = #{tID} AND (gr.AWAY_GOAL - gr.HOME_GOAL) < 0 THEN '패' WHEN gr.T_AWAYID = #{tID} AND (gr.AWAY_GOAL - gr.HOME_GOAL) = 0 THEN '무' ELSE NULL END AS resultType FROM G_RESULT gr LEFT JOIN GAME g ON gr.G_ID = g.G_ID LEFT JOIN TEAM th ON gr.T_HOMEID = th.T_ID LEFT JOIN TEAM ta ON gr.T_AWAYID = ta.T_ID WHERE (gr.T_HOMEID = #{tID} OR gr.T_AWAYID = #{tID})
AND ( (gr.T_HOMEID = #{tID} AND CASE WHEN (gr.HOME_GOAL - gr.AWAY_GOAL) > 0 THEN '승' WHEN (gr.HOME_GOAL - gr.AWAY_GOAL) < 0 THEN '패' WHEN (gr.HOME_GOAL - gr.AWAY_GOAL) = 0 THEN '무' END = #{resultType}) OR (gr.T_AWAYID = #{tID} AND CASE WHEN (gr.AWAY_GOAL - gr.HOME_GOAL) > 0 THEN '승' WHEN (gr.AWAY_GOAL - gr.HOME_GOAL) < 0 THEN '패' WHEN (gr.AWAY_GOAL - gr.HOME_GOAL) = 0 THEN '무' END = #{resultType}) )
